typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movies
movies derive(year = abs(toInteger(year))) ~> fixcolyear
fixcolyear sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		rating as string,
		rotten_tomatoes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		rating = Rating,
		rotten_tomatoes = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> moviestable
